text.title: News, Development, and Events in ElizaOS

messageContent.text: ElizaOS made significant development improvements in various plugins. These include enhancements in code quality, type safety, and functionality across multiple plugins such as Zerion, Story, Twitter, and more. The updates are focused on maintaining existing functionalities while improving the code's robustness.

New features such as Zilliqa blockchain plugin and paraswap API-based swap action for the EVM plugin have been introduced. These provide enhanced user interactions and broaden the functionality of the existing infrastructure.
Documentation updates have been performed to keep the project instructions in line with the recent changes, enhancing the maintainability of the project.
Bitcoin experienced a dramatic decrease, with its current price at $101,701, marking a daily change of -69.98%.
Ethereum followed a similar trend as Bitcoin, with a current price of $3160.67, reflecting a daily change of -45.60%.
Solana and AI16Z tokens also reported significant declines, though less severe than Bitcoin and Ethereum, with daily changes of -2.14% and -3.49%, respectively.
The Sozu AI Hack event commenced with impressive prize funds and significant community engagement, fostering innovations in AI technology.
The Safe Agentathon introduced its AI Agent hackathon, calling on tech builders to engage with AI and crypto stacks.
